verses.roman:
'raghu kene āmāya nimantraṇa chāḍi' dila?'
svarūpa kahe,--"mane kichu vicāra karila

synonyms: raghu—Raghunātha dāsa; kene—why; āmāya—to Me; nimantraṇa—invitation; chāḍi' dila—has stopped; svarūpa kahe—Svarūpa Dāmodara replied; mane—within his mind; kichu—something; vicāra karila—he has thought.
translation: The Lord asked, "Why has Raghunātha dāsa stopped inviting Me?" Svarūpa Dāmodara replied, "He must have reconsidered something in his mind.
